name: Bluestone Lane
description: Australian-style coffee house with spacious seating, excellent wifi, and power outlets. Perfect for digital nomads and remote workers seeking a productive environment in the heart of NYC.

name: Blue Bottle Coffee
description: Minimalist coffee shop with exceptional single-origin brews. Quiet atmosphere with communal tables, perfect for focused work sessions.

name: The Coffee Collective
description: Scandinavian design meets exceptional coffee. Light-filled space with comfortable seating and a focus on sustainable, locally-roasted beans.

name: Monmouth Coffee
description: Historic coffee roastery and cafe near Borough Market. Known for exceptional beans and a cozy atmosphere that attracts writers and creatives.

name: Pablo & Rusty's
description: Industrial-chic cafe with excellent flat whites and plenty of seating. Popular with freelancers and startups in Sydney's creative district.
address: 61-63 Albion St, Surry Hills NSW 2010, Australia

name: Café de Flore
description: Historic Parisian cafe with classic charm. While touristy, the upstairs area offers a quieter space for work with traditional French cafe atmosphere.

name: Elephant Grounds
description: Modern specialty coffee shop with excellent wifi and work-friendly environment. Known for their signature elephant-shaped cookies and quality brews.
address: 5 Star St, Wan Chai, Hong Kong

name: The Gentlemen Baristas
description: Victorian railway arch converted into a stylish coffee shop. Exposed brick walls, excellent acoustics for calls, and consistently great coffee.

name: Workshop Coffee
description: Bright and airy space with communal tables and bar seating. Popular with the tech crowd, offering reliable wifi and plenty of power points.

name: Stumptown Coffee
description: Portland's famous coffee roaster with a location in NYC's trendy Ace Hotel. Industrial design with communal tables perfect for laptop work.
